message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this lower price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, I'm looking for something closer to $13,000. This product is truly worth it.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle of our values.
